Input: I want to be able to save multiple addresses in the app.
I order my food from a few different places and it is a pain to retype the address every time
I want to be able to pay more to have my order be on time not matter what.
I have little time to eat and need my food to be on time.
I want to be able te search for a specific dish.
I want to eat varried food and have to search multiple restaurants some times to get the dish I want.
I want to submit a list of my allergies in the app and have dishes show allergy information.
I am allergic to peanuts, cashews and apples, I can't be sure that the dishes don't contain that at the moment.
